api_list.api_description: Search the wiki using the OpenSearch protocol.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The search query.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The number of search results to return.

api_list.api_description: Returns a random rosary prayer.

query: Could you look up specific information about the rosary online and share a prayer with me?

api_list.api_description: Get staff information for a specific anime.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the anime.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve all primary information for a specific show by its TVmaze ID.

required_parameters.name: show_id
required_parameters.description: The TVmaze ID of the show.

query: Tell me about the staff involved in anime ID 23 and get the main information about the show with the TVmaze ID 1.

api_list.api_description: Fetches all locations, with filtering options.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of locations to retrieve.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Filter for names containing this string.

query: Can you list all locations the universe that are a type of planet?

api_list.api_description: Get the TV schedule for a specific date and channel

required_parameters.name: user
required_parameters.description: The username required to access the API.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: The date for which you want the schedule in the format dd.mm.yyyy.

required_parameters.name: channel
required_parameters.description: The channel identifier (ct1, ct2, ct24, ct4, ct5, ct6, ct7).

optional_parameters.name: regiony
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 to include regional broadcasts.

optional_parameters.name: json_format
optional_parameters.description: Set to 1 to retrieve data in JSON format.

api_list.api_description: Search the newspaper directory using OpenSearch

required_parameters.name: terms
required_parameters.description: Search query

query: I would like to check the TV schedule in JSON format on the 4th of August, 2024 using Česká Televize's API. Additionally, I'm interested in finding newspaper titles using Chronicling America's API.

api_list.api_description: Fetch up to 500 top stories from Hacker News.
Search for books by title, author, and other criteria.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The query term for the search.

optional_parameters.description: Fields to include in the response, use '*' to include all.

query: Can you tell me about the current trending top stories on Hacker News and search for books in the Open Library?

api_list.api_description: Fetch detailed info for anime/manga by ID or name.

required_parameters.description: The date for which you want the schedule in the format dd.mm.yyyy.
